DOC.brief_summary: A randomized multi-component physical activity intervention breast cancer survivor .
DOC.detailed_description: The research project study assess effect multi-component intervention increase physical activity among breast cancer survivor . Individuals meet inclusion/exclusion criterion randomize one sixteen intervention group 6 month . Intervention component include print-based education , self-monitoring , Active Living counseling , supervise exercise session , facility access . Blood sample collect baseline . Assessments ( anxiety , stress , sleep ) sample collection also occur 3 time point intervention ( Weeks 13 25 ) . Changes physical activity assess intervention group .
DOC.criteria: breast cancer survivor 3 month 5 year posttreatment report < 150 minute moderatetovigorous physical activity ( MVPA ) GPAQ physically able engage physical activity medical condition contraindicate physical activity participation cognitively unable give inform consent
